verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Crown Him with many crowns, The Lamb upon His throne; Hark! how the heavâ€™nly anthem drowns All music but its own! Awake, my soul, and sing Of Him who died for thee, And hail Him as thy matchless King Through all eternity.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Crown Him the Lord of Love: Behold His hands and side; Rich wounds yet visible above In beauty glorified: No angel in the sky Can fully bear that sight, But downward bends his burning eye At mysteries so bright.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Crown him the Lord of life, Who triumphed o'er the grave, And rose victorious in the strife For those he came to save; His glories now we sing Who died and rose on high, Who died eternal life to bring, And lives that death may die.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Crown Him the Lord of years, The Potentate of time. Creator of the rolling spheres, Ineffably sublime. All hail, Redeemer, hail! For Thou hast died for me; Thy praise shall never, never fail Throughout eternity.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Crown Him the Lord of heaven: One with the Father known, One with the Spirit through Him given From yonder glorious throne. To Thee be endless praise, For Thou for us hast died; Be Thou, O Lord, through endless days Adored and magnified.{/lang-eng}
